# VisualShaderNodeResizableBase

**Inherits:** [VisualShaderNode](VisualShaderNode.md) **\<** [Resource](Resource.md) **\<** [RefCounted](RefCounted.md) **\<** [Object](Object.md)

**Inherited By:** [VisualShaderNodeCurveTexture](VisualShaderNodeCurveTexture.md), [VisualShaderNodeCurveXYZTexture](VisualShaderNodeCurveXYZTexture.md), [VisualShaderNodeFrame](VisualShaderNodeFrame.md), [VisualShaderNodeGroupBase](VisualShaderNodeGroupBase.md)

Base class for resizable nodes in a visual shader graph.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

Resizable nodes have a handle that allows the user to adjust their size as needed.

<!-- classref-reftable-group -->
